00034 /*
00035  * Text class
00036  *
00037  * Layout item that holds text to be printed verbatim
00038  */
00039 require_once('class_vars.inc');
00040 require_once('class_lexer.inc');
00041 
00042 class Text {
00043     var $text;
00044 
00045     function Text($text='') {
00046     $this->text = $text;
00047     }
00048 
00049     function parse(&$lexer) {
00050     $token = $lexer->next_token();
00051     $this->text = $token;
00052     }
00053 
00054     function render() {
00055     print $this->text;
00056     }
00057 
00058     function _display() {
00059     print "<pre>";
00060     print "\xa text \"".$this->text."\";";
00061     print "</pre>";
00062     }
00063 
00064     function _test() {
00065     $this->_display();
00066     }
00067 
00068 }
00069 
00070 ?>
